name: Scratch Piece Wonder
description:
Welcome to Devscrat's Scratch piece:wonder

My own one piece game

w a s d to move your boat

t to interact with npc

space to dash

down arrown to jump back

1 2 3 are basic attacks

zxbnm are special attacks 

q to enter an island,e to exit

Update 1

------------------------

Rastra island

CHILLCHILL fruit

Scorch step style(ffw awakening)
